comments.body: Can we keep the configs order alphabetically?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +60,64 @@ * Can also be used to configure the Kafka Streams internal {@link KafkaConsumer}, {@link KafkaProducer} and {@link AdminClient}. * To avoid consumer/producer/admin property conflicts, you should prefix those properties using * {@link #consumerPrefix(String)}, {@link #producerPrefix(String)} and {@link #adminClientPrefix(String)}, respectively. *

* Example:
